page.title: 02SUTTON VENY VILLAGE HALL
page.content: I live just outside Sutton Veny.I come to school by car every morning. Next to the school is the village hall. My school uses it for assemblies, dinners and P.E. The villagers use it for cricket teas, the W.I.,sewing classes dances and jumble sales. Sometimes we do concerts in it. Outside is a huge playing field for the school and village. In the centre is a cricket pitch and to the right is a cricket pavilion. In front of that is an adventure playground. Near the school is a running track marked with white paint. In the summer our school has a sports day in which all the school takes part. Some of the races are hoop races, skipping races and an obstacle dressing up race.
